sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent { loginForm = this.fb.group({ email: new FormControl('', Validators.compose([Validators.required, Validators.email])), password: new FormControl('', Validators.compose([Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8)])), }); constructor(){ } }
